startMsg:
Hello! Welcome to Pizzeria "Recko". I am "Gnosis" Chatbot and I will help you to make an order.
Would you like to order pizza?
order: Would you like to order pizza?
Do you want to order pizza?
Ready to make a pizza order?
Do you want to have a look at our pizza list?
Maybe you want to order some pizza?
noQ: How can I help you then?
What questions do you have then?
What do you want to ask then?
Oh! You have a question then.
Okay, probably you already know the menu.
fallback: Sorry, I don't understand what you meant by
My apologies, I don't understand your request
I was not programmed to answer this request
I'm sorry, I don't know how to answer on your reply
Something went wrong, I don't have any suitable replies for

resultOne: Your order is: [size] [type] pizza on [crust] dough.
oneMore: Do you still want to add one more pizza?
Are you still not ready to submit?
If you finished with your order type "NO"
Do you want to order more?
Anything to add to your order? Yes or no?
Do you want to add something else to your order?
Do you want to modify your order more? Yes or no?
Type "NO" if you are ready to submit
notDoneYet: Okay. What else do you want to order?
What do you want to add?
One more pizza? What would you like to add?
order_number: You have submitted your order! Your tracking number is [order_number].
Congrats! You have successfully submitted your order. Here is your tracking number: [order_number].
Your order was submitted successfully. You are able to track your order using this number [order_number]

grab_meal: Would you like to pickup order by yourself or order a delivery?
Do you prefer delivery or pickup?
user_address_q: What address do you want to order it to?
Where do you live? Please provide your address.
user_address_answ: The order will be at your place in [min] minutes.
Your order will be ready in [min] minutes. Our courier will contact you.
You can check your order in our app. In case of any problems contact our service team.
our_address: We are waiting for you at "[restaurant_location]" in [min] minutes.
Your order will be ready in [min] minutes. Please come to this address "[restaurant_location]"
You will find your order at "[restaurant_location]" in [min] minutes.

botQuestion: What kind of pizza would you like?
What exactly would you like?
What are you choosing?
Have you made a decision? I'm ready to write down.
Are sticking to classic: margarita or four cheeses? Or something else?
What type of pizza do you want to order?
What are you ordering?
Have you chosen something already?
What type of pizza do you stick to?
What size?
What size would you prefer: large, standard or small?
What about the size: large, standard, small?
Large, standard or small. Pick the size please.
Large, standard or small?
What about the pizza crust? Thin or thick?
Thin or thick crust?
Pick the crust now please
Do you prefer your pizza on thick or thin crust?
On which crust do you want your pizza? Thick, thin?
Thick crust pizza or thin crust pizza?
Would you like it on thin or thick crust?
